RESUMAID (GitHub Link -https://github.com/kalpit10/RESUMAID.. )
A Web Application which helps students to generate a resume based on template of choice with download as PDF functionality.
ATS capabilities - checks your resume against some predefined rules and generate a score accordingly, so you can improve your resume. Also, the user can log in again to access the data saved with the system and make updates accordingly.
Tech Stack – MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS) Stack.

in front-end development.
